verbs.description: [V: hating] [ARG1: on connecticut] more often than not it seems nutmeggers harp on the negative but are these real beefs about connecticut or are we just cranky yankees professor david cadden u s sierra fleury connecticut new york yankees freddy faulkner chief meteorologist ryan hanrahan yankees
